AU.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
AU.description: When a mystical jewel to control nature is stolen, it’s up to you and your brother to retrieve it by searching the vast waters of your land, putting your fishing skills to the ultimate test. First you’ll need to fish for small fry to feed yourself and to sell for better tackle and rods, before you take on the big catches. Legend of the River King 2 is a massive role-playing adventure featuring all types of angling from fresh water fly-fishing to deep-sea trawling. Plus, try your hand at bug hunting and flower picking, too.

BE.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
BE.description: Un joyau mystérieux qui contrôle la nature a été dérobé, et c'est à vous et à votre frère qu'il revient de le retrouver en parcourant mers et rivières. Vous aurez besoin de tous vos talents de pêcheur pour y arriver. Avant de vous attaquer aux gros poissons, attrapez tout d'abord de petites prises pour vous nourrir, mais également pour les vendre et obtenir du matériel plus sophistiqué. Legend of River King 2 est jeu de rôle et d'aventure qui vous transporte des eaux les plus calmes aux plus turbulentes. En plus, vous pouvez attraper des insectes et récolter des fleurs.

CY.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
CY.description: When a mystical jewel to control nature is stolen, it’s up to you and your brother to retrieve it by searching the vast waters of your land, putting your fishing skills to the ultimate test. First you’ll need to fish for small fry to feed yourself and to sell for better tackle and rods, before you take on the big catches. Legend of the River King 2 is a massive role-playing adventure featuring all types of angling from fresh water fly-fishing to deep-sea trawling. Plus, try your hand at bug hunting and flower picking, too.

AT.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
AT.description: Als ein mystischer Edelstein, mit dem man die Natur kontrollieren kann, gestohlen wird, liegt es an deinem Bruder und dir, ihn wiederzufinden. Hierbei durchsuchst du die weitläufigen Gewässer deines Landes und stellst deine Angelkünste auf die ultimative Probe. Bevor du dich an die großen Fische wagst, musst du zuerst versuchen, kleinere Exemplare zu erwischen, um deinen Hunger zu stillen oder um sie zu verkaufen, damit du dir bessere Ausrüstung und Angelruten leisten kannst. Legend of the River King 2 ist ein riesiges Rollenspiel-Abenteuer, das sich durch die vielen verschiedenen Angelarten, wie beispielsweise Süßwasser-Fliegenfischen oder Grundschleppnetzfischerei, auszeichnet. Außerdem kannst du dich in der Insektenjagd und im Blumenpflücken versuchen.

ES.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
ES.description: Han robado una gema mística con el poder de controlar la naturaleza. Para recuperarla, tu hermano y tú debéis rastrear las aguas de vuestra tierra y demostrar vuestra destreza con la pesca. Empezad capturando peces pequeños para alimentaros y venderlos. Con lo que ganéis, podréis ir consiguiendo mejores aparejos y sacar ejemplares más grandes. Legend of the River King 2 es una gran aventura de rol que incluye todas las modalidades de pesca, desde la de arrastre hasta la pesca con mosca. Además, podrás comprobar qué tal se te da cazar insectos y coger flores.

IE.name: Legend of the River King™ 2

IT.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
IT.description: Un gioiello mistico con il potere di controllare la natura è stato rubato, e tocca a te e tuo fratello andare alla sua ricerca, passando al setaccio le acque della tua terra e mettendo alla prova le tue abilità di pesca. Dovrai iniziare dai pesci piccoli per nutrirti e poterti permettere attrezzature e canne da pesca migliori, poi potrai dedicarti a prede più grosse. Legend of the River King 2 è un vastissimo gioco di ruolo in cui potrai sperimentare ogni tipo di pesca, da quella con la mosca alla pesca a strascico in mare aperto. Puoi anche catturare insetti e raccogliere fiori!

NL.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
NL.description: Wanneer een mystiek juweel waarmee je de natuur in je macht hebt is gestolen, is het aan jou en je broer om het terug te vinden door de uitgestrekte wateren af te zoeken en je visvaardigheden tot het uiterste te testen. Allereerst moet je kleine vissen vangen om jezelf te voeden en om te verkopen voor beter vistuig. Daarna kun je gaan voor de grotere vangsten. Legend of the River King 2 is een enorme RPG-avonturengame met allerlei takken van de hengelsport, van vliegvissen in zoetwater tot vissen met sleepnetten op zee. Je kunt ook op jacht gaan naar insecten en bloemen plukken.

SI.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
SI.description: When a mystical jewel to control nature is stolen, it’s up to you and your brother to retrieve it by searching the vast waters of your land, putting your fishing skills to the ultimate test. First you’ll need to fish for small fry to feed yourself and to sell for better tackle and rods, before you take on the big catches. Legend of the River King 2 is a massive role-playing adventure featuring all types of angling from fresh water fly-fishing to deep-sea trawling. RO.description: When a mystical jewel to control nature is stolen, it’s up to you and your brother to retrieve it by searching the vast waters of your land, putting your fishing skills to the ultimate test. First you’ll need to fish for small fry to feed yourself and to sell for better tackle and rods, before you take on the big catches. Legend of the River King 2 is a massive role-playing adventure featuring all types of angling from fresh water fly-fishing to deep-sea trawling. Plus, try your hand at bug hunting and flower picking, too.

RU.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
RU.description: Таинственный драгоценный камень, позволяющий контролировать силы природы, похищен! Теперь вся надежда на вас с братом — отыщите сокровище в безбрежных водах вашего королевства, применив свои способности к рыбной ловле. Для начала улова должно хватить, чтобы прокормить вас самих, а затем и на то, чтобы обменять его на лучшие рыболовные снасти для будущих больших уловов. Legend of the River King 2 — это уникальная ролевая игра-приключение, в ней представлены всевозможные виды рыбалки: от обычной удочки до тралового лова в глубоководье. А охота на жуков и сбор цветов для сада внесут разнообразие в вашу миссию.

SE.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
SE.description: When a mystical jewel to control nature is stolen, it’s up to you and your brother to retrieve it by searching the vast waters of your land, putting your fishing skills to the ultimate test. First you’ll need to fish for small fry to feed yourself and to sell for better tackle and rods, before you take on the big catches. Legend of the River King 2 is a massive role-playing adventure featuring all types of angling from fresh water fly-fishing to deep-sea trawling. Plus, try your hand at bug hunting and flower picking, too.

ZA.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
ZA.description: When a mystical jewel to control nature is stolen, it’s up to you and your brother to retrieve it by searching the vast waters of your land, putting your fishing skills to the ultimate test. First you’ll need to fish for small fry to feed yourself and to sell for better tackle and rods, before you take on the big catches. Legend of the River King 2 is a massive role-playing adventure featuring all types of angling from fresh water fly-fishing to deep-sea trawling. Plus, try your hand at bug hunting and flower picking, too.

PT.name: Legend of the River King™ 2
PT.description: Foi roubada uma jóia mística capaz de controlar a natureza e cabe-te a ti e ao teu irmão recuperá-la. Para isso, terás de procurar na vastidão das águas da tua região e colocar as tuas habilidades de pesca à prova. Em primeiro lugar, terás de pescar peixes pequenos para te alimentares e para venderes de modo a poderes comprar melhores equipamentos e canas. Só depois poderás começar a pensar em pescar algo maior. Legende of the River King 2 é um RPG repleto de aventura que conta com todos os tipos de pesca, de pesca à pluma em água doce à pesca com rede no mar profundo. Além disso, poderás também apanhar insectos e flores.
